column1:
Template variables
[attribute] — e.g. [name], [price], [manufacturer], [color] — will be replaced with the respective product attribute value or removed if value is not available
[attribute1|attribute2|...] — e.g. [manufacturer|brand] — if the first attribute value is not available for the product the second will be used and so on untill it finds a value
[prefix {attribute} suffix] or
[prefix {attribute1|attribute2|...} suffix] — e.g. [({color} color)] — if an attribute value is available it will be prepended with prefix and appended with suffix, either prefix or suffix can be used alone
Additional variables available for Product Meta Title only: [category], [categories]
Examples
Product URL Key
[name] [by {manufacturer|brand}] [{color} color] [for {price}] will be transformed into
htc-touch-diamond-by-htc-black-color-for-517-50
Product Meta Title
[name] [by {manufacturer|brand}] [({color} color)] [for {price}] [in {categories}] will be transformed into
HTC Touch Diamond by HTC (Black color) for ˆ 517.50 in Cell Phones - Electronics

column1:
Can be either a full action name or a request path. Wildcard allowed
Examples:
review_product_*
review/product/*
rss_*
rss/*
column2:
Can be either a full action name or a request path. Wildcard allowed
Examples:
review_product_*
review/product/*
rss_*
rss/*

column1: Canonical URL Meta Header will not be added for these pages
column2: Canonical URL Meta Header will not be added for these pages

column1:
For use with Use categories path for product URLs setting
Use Default will use categories path related to the current categories path for product URL
Use Longest will use the longest categories path for product URL
Use Shortest will use the shortest categories path for product URL
column2:
For use with Use categories path for product URLs setting
Use Default will use categories path related to the current categories path for product URL
Use Longest will use the longest categories path for product URL
Use Shortest will use the shortest categories path for product URL

column2: Leave blank to use Product Meta Title Template

column2: Leave blank to use Product URL Key Template
